text: is the name for the earthly remains of a castle structure in Kagawa Prefecture, Japan. The castle was demolished by Tokugawa shogunate`s one country one castle rule in 1615. ==Current== The castle was listed as one of the Continued Top 100 Japanese Castles in 2017. ==References== Category:Castles in Kagawa Prefecture Category:Former castles in Japan Category:Ruined castles in Japan
title: Hiketa Castle
